      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalBishopMove(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if the number of columns moved is equal to the number of rows moved
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalKingMove(Move move)
      Returns true if the piece moves less than 2 squares in any direction or castled legally.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalKnightMove(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if move was in an "L"
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalMoveStyle(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Delegates to the appropriate method to check if the style of move matches the piece being moved.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalPawnMove(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if piece moved one or two squares forward, captured one square diagonally, or captured via en passent
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalQueenMove(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if piece moved along a column or row, or if the change in row number is equal to the change in column number
      static boolean RuleEngine.isLegalRookMove(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if move was along a column or along a row.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isNotSameSquare(Move move)
      Returns true if the start square is different than the end square, false otherwise
      static boolean RuleEngine.isNotSelfCapture(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if the color of the piece on the end square differs from that of the start square.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isNotSelfCheck(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Simulates the move in question, and checks to see if the moving player would be in check afterwards.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblocked(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Delegates to the appropriate handler to verify the that path of the piece in the move parameter is not blocked.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedBishopPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if there are no pieces on the diagonal from the start square in argument move to the end square in the argument move.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedKingPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedKnightPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedPawnPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if the initial movement of a pawn is two squares and is blocked.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedQueenPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if there is an unobstructed path from the queen to her destination square, false otherwise.
      static boolean RuleEngine.isUnblockedRookPath(Move move, BoardController boardController)
      Returns true if there are no pieces on squares between the start and end squares of the move parameter, assuming movement along a column or row.
